summary: This bill, the Women’s and Family Protection Act of 2025, amends the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act. It revises the definition of 'homeless individual' to include those residing in indigenous, rural, or marginalized communities. It also mandates the Secretary to specifically include women, women with children, and survivors of gender-based violence within the domestic violence definition. Furthermore, it establishes a Women’s and Families’ Emergency Shelter Program, providing grants to private nonprofit organizations that serve vulnerable populations.
